About

Csongor knows how to tell stories on the web, and, how to make them work.

He offers consulting, design, development, deployment and optimization services for international companies and organizations.

Clients

Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project

The Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project is an international organization investigating corruption worldwide.

Together we've redesigned their old website and made it responsive.
